reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater fits perfectly and is super soft.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super soft and excellent quality, Tons of compliments!
items.body: I ordered the grey and pink shrugs, and they are amazing! Excellent quality, super soft, and the cuffs are perfect if you want to push the sleeve up your arm and stay there to get out of your way if wanted. I've gotten so many compliments on them when I've worn them. I wish they made an off-white/ivory (not beige) instead of the bright white, and red, other colors too. I'd definitely order more colors. They can be worn almost all year long due to its lightweight feel. I ordered the size small, and it fits perfectly on my 120 lb frame. I highly recommend! Read more
items.author: Girlsnstilettos

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for cocktails or adding warmth to a summer dress.
items.body: Fits perfect. Soft and elegant. 5'2" 140lbs, size large. Read more
items.author: Heather

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and cute
items.body: I bought the large when I’m usually a small/medium because I wanted extra fabric and it’s perfect. I wouldn’t expect it to stay completely on your shoulders if you sized up like I did but I love the way it looks. It’s soft too. Read more
items.author: Naomi

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars size down
items.body: wish i got a small, i’m usually a medium. it falls off my shoulders Read more
items.author: Randi Evans

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cute but a bit loose
items.body: Got this for my partner, and while do like it, it isn't their favorite piece. The good is that they don't like it as it feels loose on them, and sags. That said, the fabric os really nice, soft and cushy. It is a cozy and warm where it covers. They mostly use it as a scarf that can cover their arms when needed. So it has a bit more function than simply a half sweater. The price is good, but the fit might differ from person to person. Read more
items.author: Plu Was Here

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So soft and cozy
items.body: This black bolero is everything I wanted it to be. I live in a hot climate so I dont usually need much more than a short sleeve or tank top, but when it gets a little cooler this is perfect for covering my shoulders without making the rest of my body feel too warm. I love lounging in big cozy sweaters and sweatshirts but its just not possible for most of the year here, so I was looking for something that would still have that comfy cozy snuggly feel. Its very soft and has absolutely no scratchy stiffness. It has a thickness to it without adding heat. I’m 5’3, around 160lb, and normally between a large and extra large and for this I ordered the extra large. I wanted it to be just a bit oversized and boyfriendy and its perfect for that. It has a good deal of stretch to it so if I was looking for a more slim fit a large could have worked. I put it on my mother to model. Its a little big on her, but regardless she now keeps trying to snag it from me when she gets a chill. Too many clothes end up making me feel overwhelmed with how constricting they are but this sweater is the opposite. I can move about and do whatever tasks or chores I need to take care of and I actually forget that I even have it on. I can wear it over a tight fitting top but it still has enough room that it can pair with something more loose. I love the drop sleeve - it gives it a little extra draping in a good way. Its so soft that its become my go-to when I grab something first thing in the morning and when I’m trying to unwind and relax in the evening. I’m basically living in this thing at this point and will need to get one for my mother, as well, because it’s becoming a funny game of “I had it first.” Definitely recommend this. Read more
items.author: Julie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looking Good
items.body: I am on the busty side with long arms , a long torso, and a flat tummy. With those varying proportions, it is sometimes hard to find sweaters or shrugs that fit to my liking. I am happy to say that this shrug fits me well in all the right places and looks great. The fabric is nice and soft without being hot or scratchy, and looks great with anything. Read more
items.author: SDWIS

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Dark Green, Light Blue, Pink, White, Apricot, Black, Grey. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
